mapper.select: SELECT `processtask_id` as `processTaskId`, `score_template_id` as `scoreTemplateId`, `score_dimension_id` as `scoreDimensionId`, `score` as `score`, `is_auto` as `isAuto`, `fcu` as `fcu`, `fcd` as `fcd` FROM `processtask_score` where `processtask_id` = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE ps,psc,pst FROM `processtask_score` ps JOIN `processtask_score_content` psc ON ps.`processtask_id` = psc.`processtask_id` JOIN `processtask_score_template` pst ON ps.`processtask_id` = pst.`processtask_id` WHERE ps.`processtask_id` = #{value}
